name: woood-app
description: WOOOD Delivery Date Picker - Modern Shopify Checkout Extension with React Query, itty-router, and webhook-based architecture powered by Cloudflare Workers for global performance

scripts.build: npm run build:workers && npm run build:extensions
scripts.build:workers: cd workers && npm install && wrangler build
scripts.build:extensions: cd extensions/date-picker && npm install && npm run build && cd ../shipping-method && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:workers:staging && npm run deploy:shopify:staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:workers:production && npm run deploy:shopify:production
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd workers && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../extensions/date-picker && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../shipping-method && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install: npm install && cd workers && npm install && cd ../extensions/date-picker && npm install && cd ../shipping-method && npm install

author: WOOOD Development Team
